Summary: triangle, Huge, a lot like the Tr3b
divs: Sighting DetailsI was what I call "Blessed" to see this Ufo I don't mean in the religious sense I mean in the lucky sense, Anyhow this was in 2007 time, I am 22 now I live in a old house in England with shutters which slide up, one was down at the time It was around 11ish at night, I noticed something in the corner of my eye, I looked to my window to see three red lights passing over, in a triangle shape, I rushed outside which I saw a huge Black Triangle passing over, I was amazed, it was just passing over my front of my house, completely silent I ran to the back door which I noticed it's light had changed, at the tip or top of the triangle I noticed the red light had changed to green, so It had a one red light on each tip of the triangle and at the top now a green one which was red beforehand, I had a or felt a huge respect towards this object, not fear, I remember saluting it to show my respect, by this time around 3 minutes had passed, and It sailed into the distance,The engines looked very very like the infamous star destroyer's from the star wars film, it was a pinky white colour, made no sound..
trends: There have been no other sightings in Broseley
This sighting has never been favorited.
